column2: 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)

I have tried to go completely off but get really depressed.

column2: 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 1 to less than 2 years (Patient)
column9: Have gained 10 pounds after having to double dose and crave constant sweets. Blood pressure has spiked. Facial hair plus acne makes this medication not for me.  I'd rather have the other problems!

column2: gestevez, 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: This treatment started out great but now after 5 months i am starting to see changes in me i do not like.  I have gained 10 lbs and have not changed my eating habits, I have acne which i have never ever had before and I have more facial hair plus i have stop sleeping thru the nite.  My husband said I have become mean and hard to talk to.  So the pill starts off great but turns bad.

column2: Airedale Lover, 45-54 on Treatment for 6 months to less than 1 year (Patient)
column9: I have taken this drug (double strength) for 9 months.  I have seen zero increase in libido.  I have seen an extra 20 pounds added to my stomach, hips and thighs.  I work out 4 days/week on a treadmill 40 minutes each.  I'm active on the other 3 days.  My breasts have gotten huge!  I already had adequate size and didn't need to see additional growth.  Very displeased with the results.  What else is out there for us who have had a full hystro and over the age of 50 with hot flashes, night sweats, low energy (throw in an under active thyroid too) and lack of libodo?  This drug was able to level out my mmood swings - that is all it has done.

column9: I feel much better, less vaginal dryness and increased libido.  Mort vitality

column2: lefty725, 55-64 Female  on Treatment for 10 years or more (Patient)
column9: I had a partial hystro in 1990 and started taking full strength in '97 due to libido problems. I switched to half strength 2 yrs ago without any problem. In June '09, my prescription service took Estratest off their formulary. My doctor's MA then talked me into stopping HRT due to risks. My life turned completely upside down (hot flashes, night sweats, mood swings, unable to sleep thru the night, problems with libido - I was starting to feel like a zombie due to lack of sleep). Switched to a female doctor and she put me back on half strength just yesterday. I can't believe how much better I feel with just one dose. I actually got a good night's sleep last night!!! This incident has taught me a very valuable lesson - I will never again allow a pharmacy or a doctor's MA dictate what I can and cannot take!!
